pullRequest.title: doc: use public inner class for reflection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hi, I was learning the quarkus guide Validation with Hibernate Validator and found that when Result is added as private inner class, it ends up with the following exception.
As I make it public, the code worked fine without exception, so I modified the document.
kdnakt/quarkus-sandbox@a8de4f6#diff-cf29726706d51adcfc762ee31f167994

commit.message: doc: use public inner class for reflection

nodes.bodyText: We should also make it static. The quickstart is OK btw, I just checked it.
